data.name: CookieBanner_Text
data.value: This site uses essential cookies required for authentication and security. No tracking or analytics cookies are used.

data.name: Login_Description
data.value: Sign in with your Google account to access Humans.

data.name: AccessDenied_Description
data.value: You do not have permission to access this page.

data.name: Error_TryAgainLater
data.value: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.

data.name: Error404_Description
data.value: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

data.name: Home_WhyDescription
data.value: As a registered association in Spain, Nobodies Collective has legal obligations. Before anyone can access shared resources, we need to confirm agreement to our policies. This system handles that simply and keeps everything current.

data.name: Home_ComplianceDescription
data.value: To access association resources, everyone needs to agree to our policies: GDPR data handling, privacy policy, consent terms, and Creative Commons licensing. This is a one-time process (unless documents are updated).

data.name: Home_ResourceAccessDescription
data.value: Once you've completed your profile and consents, you'll have access to shared resources: Google Drive folders, team workspaces, and collaboration tools. Teams can be configured for different working groups.

data.name: Home_DocumentUpdatesDescription
data.value: Legal documents evolve. When policies change in meaningful ways, you'll be asked to review and re-consent. This ensures everyone is working under the same current agreements.

data.name: Home_VotingMembershipDescription
data.value: Our by-laws require a roll of voting members for governance (general assemblies, elections, etc.). If you'd like to participate in governance, you can apply to become a voting member. This is entirely optional.

data.name: Home_Step3
data.value: Review and consent to our legal documents (Spanish originals with English translations)

data.name: Home_GettingStartedSummary
data.value: That's it! Once your consents are in place, you'll have access to association resources. If you're interested in participating in governance as a voting member, you can optionally submit an application from your dashboard.

data.name: Dashboard_PendingConsentsAlert
data.value: Action Required: You have {0} pending consent(s). Review and consent to maintain your active membership.

data.name: Dashboard_IncompleteProfileAlert
data.value: Complete Your Profile: Your profile is incomplete. Add your information to help us know you better.

data.name: Dashboard_ProfileIncomplete
data.value: Complete your profile to help us know you better.

data.name: Dashboard_ConsentsUpToDate
data.value: All consents are up to date.

data.name: Dashboard_NoConsentsRequired
data.value: No documents require consent at this time.

data.name: Dashboard_GovernanceDescription
data.value: Asociados are voting members who participate in governance decisions like assemblies and elections. This is intended for community leaders and long-term committed volunteers.

data.name: Dashboard_GovernanceOptional
data.value: Governance participation is optional and doesn't affect your access to resources.

data.name: Profile_PendingConsents
data.value: You have {0} pending consent(s) to review.

data.name: Profile_PendingApprovalDescription
data.value: Your account is awaiting Board approval. Once approved, you'll be enrolled in the Volunteers team and receive access to organizational resources.

data.name: Profile_OnlyVisibleToYouAndBoard
data.value: only visible to you and board

data.name: ProfileEdit_BurnerNameHelp
data.value: This is your public display name, visible to everyone.

data.name: ProfileEdit_LegalNameHelp
data.value: Required for official documents and signing. Only visible to you and board members.

data.name: ProfileEdit_CityHelp
data.value: Search for your city to set your location.

data.name: ProfileEdit_BioHelp
data.value: Tell us a bit about yourself.

data.name: ProfileEdit_ContactInfoHelp
data.value: Add ways for other members to reach you. Control who can see each piece of information.

data.name: ProfileEdit_BurnerCVHelp
data.value: Document your involvement in events, roles, and camps. Entries are sorted by date (newest first).

data.name: ProfileEdit_PreferredEmailHelp
data.value: Set a different email address for receiving system notifications.

data.name: ProfilePrivacy_Lead
data.value: Manage your personal data and privacy settings.

data.name: ProfilePrivacy_ExportDescription
data.value: Download a copy of all your personal data in JSON format. This includes:

data.name: ProfilePrivacy_DeleteDescription
data.value: Request deletion of your account and personal data.

data.name: ProfilePrivacy_DeleteGracePeriod
data.value: A 30-day grace period allows you to cancel the request

data.name: ProfilePrivacy_DeleteAnonymized
data.value: After 30 days, your personal information will be anonymized and access permanently blocked

data.name: ProfilePrivacy_DeleteRetained
data.value: Anonymized records are retained for legal compliance and audit purposes but cannot be linked to your identity

data.name: ProfilePrivacy_DeletionScheduledFor
data.value: Your account is scheduled for deletion on {0}.

data.name: ProfilePrivacy_DeletionCancelInfo
data.value: You can cancel this request before the deletion date if you change your mind.

data.name: ProfilePrivacy_DPOContact
data.value: For questions about your data or privacy rights, contact our Data Protection Officer:

data.name: ProfilePrivacy_ConfirmDeletionQuestion
data.value: Are you sure you want to request deletion of your account?

data.name: ProfilePrivacy_ConfirmAnonymized30Days
data.value: Your personal information will be anonymized in 30 days

data.name: ProfilePrivacy_ConfirmCanCancel
data.value: You can cancel this request at any time before the anonymization date

data.name: ProfilePrivacy_ConfirmNoRecovery
data.value: After anonymization, your account cannot be recovered

data.name: PreferredEmail_Description
data.value: By default, system notifications are sent to your sign-in email. You can specify a different email address to receive these notifications.

data.name: PreferredEmail_VerificationSent
data.value: A verification email has been sent to {0}. Please check your inbox and click the verification link.

data.name: PreferredEmail_ResendCooldown
data.value: You can request a new verification email in {0} minute(s).

data.name: PreferredEmail_VerificationWillBeSent
data.value: A verification email will be sent to this address.

data.name: PreferredEmail_RemoveDescription
data.value: Remove your preferred email and use your sign-in email for all system notifications.

data.name: PreferredEmail_RemoveConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove your preferred email?

data.name: Profile_AlreadySignInEmail
data.value: This is already your sign-in email. No need to set it as preferred.

data.name: Profile_VerificationCooldown
data.value: Please wait {0} minute(s) before requesting another verification email.

data.name: Profile_EmailInUse
data.value: This email address is already in use by another account.

data.name: Profile_VerificationSent
data.value: Verification email sent to {0}. Please check your inbox.

data.name: Profile_VerificationExpired
data.value: The verification link is invalid or has expired.

data.name: Profile_EmailClaimed
data.value: This email address has been claimed by another account.

data.name: Profile_PreferredEmailCleared
data.value: Preferred email has been removed. System emails will now be sent to your sign-in email.

data.name: Profile_DeletionAlreadyPending
data.value: A deletion request is already pending.

data.name: Profile_DeletionRequested
data.value: Account deletion requested. Your account will be deleted on {0} unless you cancel.

data.name: Governance_AsociadoDescription
data.value: Asociados are the formal voting members of Nobodies Collective. As an asociado, you can attend general assemblies, vote on collective decisions, and participate in elections.

data.name: Governance_Optional
data.value: This is optional. Most volunteers don't need to become asociados. You already have access to resources once you've completed your profile and consents.

data.name: Governance_UnderReviewMessage
data.value: Your application is being reviewed. We'll notify you by email once a decision is made.

data.name: Governance_ApprovedMessage
data.value: Welcome! You are now an asociado of Nobodies Collective.

data.name: Governance_RejectedMessage
data.value: Your application was not approved. If you have questions, please contact the board.

data.name: Governance_AsociadoLawDescription
data.value: Asociados are the formal voting members of the association under Spanish law.

data.name: Governance_WhoShouldApplyDescription
data.value: Governance membership is intended for volunteers in leadership roles:

data.name: Governance_BoardReviews
data.value: The board reviews applications based on community involvement and alignment with the collective's mission.

data.name: Governance_NoteNotRequired
data.value: Note: You don't need to be an asociado to access resources or participate in events.

data.name: GovernanceCreate_Lead
data.value: Asociados are voting members who participate in governance decisions. This is intended for community leaders and long-term committed volunteers.

data.name: GovernanceCreate_MotivationPlaceholder
data.value: Please share your motivation for joining...

data.name: GovernanceCreate_MotivationHelp
data.value: Minimum 50 characters. Tell us about yourself and why you want to be part of the collective.

data.name: GovernanceCreate_AdditionalInfoPlaceholder
data.value: Any additional information you'd like to share...

data.name: GovernanceCreate_AdditionalInfoHelp
data.value: Optional. Include any relevant skills, experience, or how you heard about us.

data.name: GovernanceCreate_ConfirmAccuracy
data.value: I confirm that all information provided in this application is accurate and truthful.

data.name: GovernanceCreate_Step1
data.value: Your application will be reviewed by the board

data.name: GovernanceCreate_Step2
data.value: The board considers community involvement and fit

data.name: GovernanceCreate_Step3
data.value: We may contact you for more information

data.name: GovernanceCreate_Step4
data.value: You'll receive an email once a decision is made

data.name: ApplicationDetail_WithdrawDescription
data.value: If you no longer wish to proceed with this application, you can withdraw it.

data.name: ApplicationDetail_WithdrawConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to withdraw this application?

data.name: Application_AlreadyPending
data.value: You already have a pending application.

data.name: Application_ConfirmAccuracy
data.value: You must confirm the accuracy of your information.

data.name: Application_Submitted
data.value: Your application has been submitted successfully!

data.name: Consent_NoDocumentsRequired
data.value: No documents require consent at this time.

data.name: Consent_PendingCount
data.value: {0} document(s) require your consent. Please review and consent to maintain your active membership.

data.name: Consent_AllConsented
data.value: You have consented to all required documents.

data.name: Consent_AboutDescription
data.value: By consenting to these documents, you agree to be bound by their terms. The Spanish version is the legally binding text. English translations are provided for convenience only.

data.name: ConsentReview_SpanishIsLegal
data.value: The Spanish version below is the legally binding text. The English translation is provided for your convenience only and is not legally binding.

data.name: ConsentReview_TranslationDisclaimer
data.value: This translation is provided for convenience only. The Spanish version is legally binding.

data.name: ConsentReview_ConsentCheckbox
data.value: I have read and understood this document, and I agree to be bound by its terms.

data.name: ConsentReview_SpanishLegalNote
data.value: I understand that the Spanish version is the legally binding text.

data.name: Consent_MustCheck
data.value: You must check the consent checkbox to continue.

data.name: Consent_AlreadyConsented
data.value: You have already consented to this document.

data.value: No teams have been created yet.

data.value: Share the folder with this email as Editor

data.value: Add this email as a Manager of the group

data.value: Are you sure you want to unlink this resource?

data.value: No resources linked to this team yet. Use the forms below to link a Google Drive folder or Google Group.

data.value: Paste the Google Drive folder URL. The folder must be shared with the service account.

data.name: Profile_PictureInvalidFormat
data.value: Profile picture must be JPEG, PNG, or WebP format.

data.value: Upload a JPEG, PNG, or WebP image (max 20MB). Large images are automatically resized. This replaces your Google avatar.

data.name: ProfileEdit_RemovePicture
data.value: Remove custom picture (revert to Google avatar)

data.name: ProfileEdit_DateOfBirthHelp
data.value: Only visible to you and board members. Used for the team birthday calendar.

data.name: Birthdays_Privacy
data.value: Only members who have set their date of birth are shown. Date of birth is only visible to the member and board.
